evidence.text: The Plaintiff-Commissioners served continuously until May 8, 2025, and have resumed their duties since the district court’s June 13, 2025 order.

extracted.value: June 13, 2025: permanent injunction and declaratory relief restoring Plaintiff-Commissioners to their offices

evidence.text: Thus, upon correctly determining that the newly elected President’s actions were ultra vires, the district court issued a permanent injunction and declaratory relief restoring the Plaintiff-Commissioners to their offices.

extracted.value: Restoration of Plaintiff-Commissioners to their offices
